subtitle: Serve hot with custard or cream.

method.text: Line a 23 cm pie plate with pastry.
Combine sugar, flour, cinnamon and orange peel. Lightly toss with raspberr{y|ies}. Place in pastry-lined pie plate.
Sprinkle with orange juice. Dot the top with butter.
Roll out remaining pastry, Cut into 1 cm strips. Arrange in lattice pattern on top of pie. Moisten edge of lower crust, fold over lattice ends, seal and flute.
Bake for 10 min. Lower heat to 180°C and bake for 35-40 min or until crust is golden brown and filling begins to bubble.

title: Lattice-topped raspberry pie
